sentences.english: So we are looking at developing strains of fish that are tolerant to salinity.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们在考虑培育能够耐盐的鱼种。

sentences.english: Nine feeds of different formula formulated by orthogonal design were used to feed fingerlings of Megalobrama amblycephala.
sentences.chinese: 用正交法设计了九种不同配方的团头鲂鱼种饲料。

sentences.english: Sometimes they eat the young of their rivals.
sentences.chinese: 有时他们吃掉幼小的竞争鱼种。

sentences.english: Further more, discuss on the existing problems in parent fish po…
sentences.chinese: 并对鱼种土池暂养中存在的一些问题进行了讨论。

sentences.english: But the population plunged in the smallest fish species, the fathead minnow.
sentences.chinese: 然而最小的鱼种，黑头呆鱼的数量却发生了变化。

sentences.english: Angelfish are an easy-to-keep cichlid species.
sentences.chinese: 神仙鱼是易于饲养的慈鲷科鱼种。

sentences.english: The species differ in their behavior and coloration.
sentences.chinese: 不同鱼种的行为和颜色各不相同。

sentences.english: The St. Peter's fish has been a dominantspecies in the lake for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 圣彼得鱼几个世纪以来一直是此湖的主要鱼种。

sentences.english: It can move across land at night, reaching water no other fish species has colonised.
sentences.chinese: 它能在夜间穿过陆地到达没有其他鱼种繁殖的水域。

sentences.english: In addition, survival and growth of fish released were quite satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 放流鱼种生长和成活情况较好。

definition: grouper (Portuguese: garoupa)/also called 鮨/Epinephelinae (subfamily of Serranidae, fish family including grouper)
